duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate scheduling and collaboration with the Residential Program Administrator to ensure service delivery at multiple sites.
Assist with continuous quality improvements in service development and management, and compliance with DHS (245D) Licensing regulations.
Contribute to successful execution of admissions and program planning processes at the direction of the Residential Program Administrator.
Assure the management and delivery of all contracted services.
Assure compliance with all applicable State and Federal rules.
Contribute to the development of and assure the administration of all policy, procedure, and record-keeping systems related to program development.
Provide coaching and mentoring to Direct Support Professionals.
Work directly with individuals living in the home.
Be on schedule various hours, including every other weekend.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Psychology, or related field (Master's preferred)
